meanings.definition: A person who acts as an agent for the sale and purchase of buildings and land.
meanings.sent1: The realtors helped us find a new house in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: My parents always consult realtors when looking for investment properties.
meanings.sent3: The realtors joked that they could sell a sandcastle in the desert.
meanings.sent4: In the world of real estate, realtors are the knights of property transactions.
meanings.sent5: The realtors' expertise in finding hidden gems is unmatched.

meanings.definition: A company that employs real estate agents to facilitate property transactions.
meanings.sent1: We contacted several realtors to help us sell our old house.
meanings.sent2: The realtors in our area are known for their professionalism and efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The realtors organized a fun competition among their agents to boost morale.
meanings.sent4: The realtors' office buzzed with activity as deals were being closed left and right.
meanings.sent5: The realtors' success lies in their ability to connect buyers and sellers seamlessly.
